title: Cinnamon Girl
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:02.41] Cinnamon in my teeth
[00:09.47] From your kiss, you're touchin' me
[00:16.52] All the pills that you take
[00:22.53] Violet, blue, green, red to keep me at arm's length don't work
[00:29.43] You try to push me out
[00:32.28] But I just find my way back in
[00:36.85] Violet, blue, green, red to keep me out
[00:40.59] I win
[00:41.54] There's things I wanna say to you
[00:45.29] But I'll just let you live
[00:48.37] Like if you hold me without hurting me
[00:52.18] You'll be the first who ever did
[00:55.38] There's things I wanna talk about
[00:59.00] But better not to give
[01:02.13] But if you hold me without hurting me
[01:06.08] You'll be the first who ever did
[01:09.46] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[01:13.37] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[01:16.81] Hold me, love me, touch me, honey
[01:20.25] Be the first who ever did
[01:23.42] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[01:27.17] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[01:30.41] Hold me, love me, touch me, honey
[01:34.15] Be the first who ever did
[01:40.28] Kerosene in my hands
[01:46.63] You make me mad, I'm fire again
[01:54.19] All the pills that you take
[01:59.65] Violet, blue, green, red to keep me at arm's length don't work
[02:05.46] There's things I wanna say to you
[02:08.51] But I'll just let you live
[02:11.68] Like if you hold me without hurting me
[02:15.47] You'll be the first who ever did
[02:18.70] There's things I wanna talk about
[02:22.42] But better not to give
[02:25.50] But if you hold me without hurting me
[02:29.32] You'll be the first who ever did
[02:33.09] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[02:36.96] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[02:40.12] Hold me, love me, touch me, honey
[02:43.44] Be the first who ever did
[02:46.75] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[02:50.40] Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
[02:54.11] Hold me, love me, touch me, honey
[02:57.44] Be the first who ever did
[03:01.00] There's things I wanna say to you
[03:04.34] But I'll just let you live
[03:07.22] Like if you hold me without hurting me
[03:11.17] You'll be the first who ever did
[03:14.31] There's things I wanna talk about
[03:18.53] But better not to give
[03:21.62] Like if you hold me without hurting me
[03:25.53] You'll be the first who ever did
